label: RmStopW
info: Stopwords and one letter words are removed from the corpus.

label: Dim w2v
info: Length of embeddings on Word2Vec method.

label: Dim d2v
info: Length of embeddings on Doc2Vec method.

label: %Train
info: Probability of an observation being sampled as training on the prediction model.

label: Clusters
info: Number of clusters applied to BOW.

label: DimRed w2v
info: Type of dimension reduction applied to the Word2Vec embeddings.

label: ModBOW
info: The words "precedente" and "imprecedente" (founded and unfounded in portuguese) are removed from the corpus.

label: Label
info: Which label of the datasets are to be selected.

label: Return
info: Instead of the embeddings, using theirs returns (difference between words next to each other).
